items.headline: How the fragile AI ecosystem may be one of the biggest risks to markets this year
items.summary_en: A compromised Fed and political tensions are also among the five factors worrying Scott Helfstein at Global X.

items.headline: ‘It all feels impossible’: I’m 57 and on disability. My boyfriend died of a heart attack. Do I buy a townhouse or a condo?
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I still have a mortgage’: I’m no longer confident that my costs will actually fall in retirement. What can I do?
items.summary_en: “I think my withdrawals from my 401(k) and IRA may need to be larger than my current take-home pay.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘The house has quadrupled in value’: I bought a house with my brother, but he did not contribute. How do I fix this?
items.summary_en: “My brother lived with me for eight years, then left to live abroad, married and followed his dreams.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: I was asked, ‘Should we adopt AI?’ in a job interview. I said yes, but my answer fell flat. Was this a trick question?
items.summary_en: The interviewer replied, “That would be nice, but we don’t have the money to integrate it right now.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘Fifty Shades of Grey’ author E.L. James lists her L.A. mansion for $7.25 million
items.summary_en: Author E.L. James has put her sprawling Los Angeles home on the market for $7.25 million—having slashed a staggering $1 million from her original asking price.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Play the AI boom without the bubble risk via these ‘transition’ stocks, says Bank of America
items.summary_en: Bank of America analysts suggest defense, infrastructure and transition materials represent the optimal indirect exposure to AI
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: My mom, 90, has dementia. My brother wants her to buy a $500K house near his house. Does that make any sense?
items.summary_en: “I can’t, for the life of me, see how this makes sense on any level — personal or financial.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I’m considering driving Lyft part time’: I’m 58 with a $1 million home. Do I finally give up work and enjoy life?
items.summary_en: “One thought is for me to stop working at age 60, while my wife continues for two more years at her teaching job.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I don’t want to step on any toes’: I manage an $80K trust for a 15-year-old relative. How do I deal with interfering relatives?
items.summary_en: “I also want to teach my young relative good money habits without overstepping the parents’ authority.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.
